pageTitle: SiriusXM (SIRI) Still a Buy: TheStreet Ratings - TheStreet
TableContextTimeStampBeforeTable: {10396=Access the tool that DOMINATES the Russell 2000 and the S&P 500., 16223=NEW YORK (TheStreet) -- TheStreet Ratings team has reiterated its "buy" rating for SiriusXM Radio Inc (SIRI - Get Report) with a score of B, pegging recent weakness in the stock as an opportunity for a bargain. During Thursday's trading, shares dropped 1.2% to $3.61, 12% lower than the year's high of $4.18 set on Oct. 22. So far, 70.8 million shares have changed hands, the day's third most actively traded stock after Twitter (TWTR) and Facebook (FB).}
